title: Zach Johnson (rugby league)
text:
Zachary Johnson is an English professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who last played as a for <a href="Hunslet%20RLFC">Hunslet</a> in <a href="RFL%20League%201">RFL League 1</a>.
Background.
Johnson was born in <a href="Dewsbury">Dewsbury</a>, <a href="West%20Yorkshire">West Yorkshire</a>, England.
Career.
Swinton Lions.
Johnson started his career with the <a href="Swinton%20Lions">Swinton Lions</a> and has previously spent time on loan at the <a href="Hunslet%20R.L.F.C.">Hunslet Hawks</a> in <a href="RFL%20League%201">Kingstone Press League 1</a>.
Coventry Bears.
On 3 Feb 2017 the club announced that Zach had signed for <a href="Coventry%20Bears">Coventry Bears</a>
Hunslet R.L.F.C..
On 3 Jan 2020 it was reported that he had signed for <a href="Hunslet%20R.L.F.C.">Hunslet R.L.F.C.</a> in the <a href="RFL%20League%201">RFL League 1</a>, but by Feb 2021 he had left Hunslet.
